comment.author: 57140310@N04
comment._content:
More evidence for Mines Field, beside the B-25 in the background. This P-12E is a class 26 instructional airframe being used by California Flyer School of Aviation of Inglewood CA to train AAF aircraft mechanics. There is a picture of this P-12E, a P-6E, P-26 and a new P-51 lined up with B-25s in the background that you may have seen. 
Best regards,
Tom
